nodes.bodyText: pretty common to see null checks right before equals comparisons but following this rule such checks are not required.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -38,23 +38,8 @@ *

*

Rationale: Calling the {@code equals()} method on String literals * will avoid a potential {@code NullPointerException}. Also, it is - * pretty common to see null checks right before equals comparisons, - * which is not necessary in the example below. + * pretty common to see null checks right before equals comparisons.
